```{r setup, include=FALSE}
#Setup R
# Global options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  fig.align = "center",
  fig.path = "figures/",
  fig.pos='H', 
  message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='hide'
)

# Load libraries
library(quantmod)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)
library(lubridate)
library(car)
library(knitr)

# Source your strategy / backtest code
source("R/strategies.R")
source("R/backtesting.R")
source("R/Tuning.R")
source("R/Analysis_Tuning.R")
source("R/ARMA_GARCH/ARMA_GARCH_Forecasts.R")
source("R/Hypothesis_Testing.R")
source("R/Plots.R")


# register the code chunks
knitr::read_chunk("R/strategies.R")
knitr::read_chunk("R/ARMA_GARCH/ARMA_GARCH_Forecasts.R")
knitr::read_chunk("R/backtesting.R")
knitr::read_chunk("R/Hypothesis_Testing.R")
names(knitr::knit_code$get())

#Set seed for reproducibility
set.seed(123)
```
